metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39272 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low.
metadata.Description:
Fetchmail before 6.4.22 fails to enforce STARTTLS session encryption in some circumstances, such as a certain situation with IMAP and PREAUTH.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-39272` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

fetchmail - 6.4.32-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> when backporting, upstream is asking to make sure we update documentation covering the fixes as well mdeslaur> only an issue with IMAP PREAUTH sessions and STARTTLS. It is recommended to switch to implicit TLS

criterions.comment: fetchmail package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.4.32-1').
